subject: Attn ALL PAYMENT BENEFICIARI
body:
Attn ALL PAYMENT BENEFICIARIES,
This is to bring to your notice that a new government has been installed in the CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA (CBN). My name is
Mr. Olayemi Micheal Cardoso, current sitting Governor of CBN. I am here to restore the lost Glory of this great country,Nigeria which impostors and former Governors has destroyed.
I have had a series of Meeting with the President Bola Ahmed Tinubu and we also invited the Head of U.S FBI,IRS AND the leaders of United Nations over the release of contract payments and compensation funds to the good citizens of the United States of America,Europe,Asian Countries. During this meeting, i submitted my own method of operation and it was all agreed and approved.
According to the file containing your name in CBN for compensation / contract payment,you;re now entitled to receive the first phase payment of $1.5 m USD ( One Million Five Hundred Thousand United States Dollars). In other to prevent incessant demands of upfront fees to process the release of the funds to you, being the head of CBN, I Mr.Olayemi Micheal Cardoso, being the head and Governor of CBN, have decided that every beneficiary of this payment (MUST) willingly pay $150 NOTARY CHARGE
We have being able to set up a legal team .The  primary duty of the legal team is to prepare an agreement Letter binding you and the CBN to release your funds immediately after you have paid the one time NOTARY CHARGE of $150.Please, Do not have nagative mindset abouy paying this fee, because of your past experience, its 100% certain that no one is trying to reep you off your hard earned money, but to restore your hope and all what you have lost.  The legal department will send you a copy of this agreement letter to sign and keep copy for future reference and you can sue the government of Nigeria if your payment is not released and transferred to your account, after you have paid for the NOTARY FEE.
Therefore, you;re further advise to reconfirm to us
1..Your full names........
2--Home /office address,....
3--Occupation........
4..Direct cell phone...
BANK DETAILS FOR FUND TRANSFER
5..Bank name.....
6..Bank address...
7..Account no.....
8..Routing no....
9..Swift code...
Thank you for your maximum cooperation, expecting your reply with the listed information.
Best Regards,
Mr,Olayemi Micheal Cardoso
CURRENT GOVERNOR
CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA, CBN

subject: Re:   Attn ALL PAYMENT BENEFICIARI
body:
Hello Mr. Micheal Cardoso,

Thank you for reaching out and providing such detailed information about the new government installation in the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN). It's quite interesting to hear about these changes and your role as the current sitting Governor.

I'm intrigued by your method of operation that was agreed upon and approved during your meetings with President Bola Ahmed Tinubu, the Head of AND, and United Nations leaders. Could you share more details about this method? How does it differ from previous methods?

Regarding the contract payment, I appreciate your assurance about the NOTARY CHARGE. However, could you provide more clarity on what this charge covers? Also, how is it determined?

You mentioned a legal team that prepares an agreement letter. Could you tell me more about this team? Who are they and what is their experience in handling such matters?

Lastly, I would like to know more about the process after paying the NOTARY FEE. What are the next steps? How long does it usually take for funds to be released and transferred?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Donald
